New Records: Taskin Ahmed took 4 wickets for Bangladesh in the match.
Afif Hossain Dhrubo scored 38 runs off 27 balls.
Key Match Events: Bangladesh won the match by 9 runs.
Shakib Al Hasan expressed concerns about the batting performance, particularly the frequent wicket losses.
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan highlighted the importance of the win for Bangladesh's T20 World Cup campaign.
He emphasized the impact of losing wickets and acknowledged the team's batting struggles.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh's next match is against South Africa on October 27 at the Sydney Cricket Ground.
